properties.name: stubrunner.cloud.consul.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable register stubs in Consul.

properties.name: stubrunner.cloud.delegate.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable DiscoryClient's StubRunner implementation.

properties.name: stubrunner.cloud.eureka.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable register stubs in Eureka.

properties.name: stubrunner.cloud.stubbed.discovery.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable Stubbed Discovery mode.

properties.name: stubrunner.cloud.zookeeper.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable register stubs in Zookeper.

properties.name: stubrunner.integration.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable StubRunner for Spring Integration.

properties.name: stubrunner.stream.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable StubRunner for Spring Cloud Stream.
